name: grief-vr-therapist-portal-template
description: Dependency manifest for Therapist Portal template code. These dependencies are NOT installed in the current project.
note: This file documents required dependencies for the template code in lib/ and app/. To activate the Therapist Portal, install these dependencies and update tsconfig.json. See THERAPIST_PORTAL_TEMPLATE.md for details.

requiredEnvironmentVariables.BETTER_AUTH_SECRET: Secret key for session encryption (generate with openssl rand -hex 32)
requiredEnvironmentVariables.BETTER_AUTH_URL: Base URL of your application (e.g., https://yourdomain.com)

installationSteps: 1. Install dependencies: npm install better-auth drizzle-orm postgres autumn resend @upstash/workflow
3. Configure environment variables in .env (see requiredEnvironmentVariables above)
4. Update tsconfig.json: Remove 'lib' and 'app' from exclude array
5. Run database migrations: npx drizzle-kit generate:pg && npx drizzle-kit push:pg
6. Optionally migrate to Next.js or adapt to Netlify Functions
8. See THERAPIST_PORTAL_TEMPLATE.md for complete integration guide
